select gr.*, r.ids rid, r.names rname,g.ids gid, g.names gname
from pt_grouprole gr left join pt_group g on g.ids = gr.groupids left join pt_role r on r.ids = gr.roleids
where gr.roleids = ? and gr.groupids = ?

select gr.*, r.ids rid, r.names rname,g.ids gid, g.names gname
from pt_grouprole gr left join pt_group g on g.ids = gr.groupids left join pt_role r on r.ids = gr.roleids
where gr.roleids = ?

select gr.*, r.ids rid, r.names rname,g.ids gid, g.names gname
from pt_grouprole gr left join pt_group g on g.ids = gr.groupids left join pt_role r on r.ids = gr.roleids
where gr.groupids = ?

select gr.*, r.ids rid, r.names rname,g.ids gid, g.names gname
from pt_grouprole gr left join pt_group g on g.ids = gr.groupids left join pt_role r on r.ids = gr.roleids
where gr.roleids != ?

select r.*
from pt_role r
where r.ids not in ( select gr.roleids from pt_grouprole gr where gr.groupids = ? )

select o.ids, o.url
from pt_operator o left join pt_roleoperator ro on ro.operatorids = o.ids left join pt_grouprole gr on gr.roleids = ro.roleids
where gr.groupids = ?
